deprecation.message: GroupDocs.Metadata API has been moved to a new package "GroupDocs.Metadata" with new & improved feature set.

description:
GroupDocs.Metadata for .NET is a class library to process metadata associated with various Document and Image formats.

Key Features:

-  Covers most popular document formats: Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, PDF, Microsoft OneNote 
-  Covers most popular image formats: GIF, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, PSD
-  Covers most popular email formats: Outlook Message, Email Message
-  Create, modify and remove metadata associated with supported document and image formats with a few lines of code
-  Manage EXIF metadata in Jpeg and TIFF formats
-  Manage XMP metadata in image formats
-  Utilities to inspect and clean hidden metadata
-  Utilities to Search and Compare all metadata
-  Metadata cleaner utility

For more details on the library, please visit GroupDocs website at: 
http://groupdocs.com/dot-net/document-metadata-library

Note: The library comes up with some limitations in the evaluation mode. In order to test full features of GroupDocs.Metadata for .NET library, please request a free 30-day temporary license.
releaseNotes:
New features:

New Feature - METADATA-522 Support XMP Basic Job Ticket Schema
New Feature - METADATA-582 Ability to inspect and remove hidden data in Word format
New Feature - METADATA-690 Implement Comparison API
New Feature - METADATA-697 Ability to save EXIF data using properties
New Feature - METADATA-715 Implement Search API
New Feature - METADATA-736 Ability to work with geo-location directly in EXIF formats
New Feature - METADATA-748 Ability to read and write Thumbnails property in Xmp Basic schema
summary: GroupDocs.Metadata for .NET is a class library to process metadata associated with various Document and Image formats.
title: GroupDocs.Metadata for .NET
